com.android.volley.cache

Class SimpleImageLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.android.volley.toolbox.ImageLoader
      • com.android.volley.cache.SimpleImageLoader

  • public class SimpleImageLoader
extends ImageLoader
    A class that wraps up remote image loading requests using the Volley library combined with a memory cache. An single instance of this class should be created once when your Activity or Fragment is created, then use get(String, android.widget.ImageView) or one of the variations to queue the image to be fetched and loaded from the network. Loading images in a ListView or GridView is also supported but you must store the Request in your ViewHolder type class and pass it into loadImage to ensure the request is canceled as views are recycled.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes

      Interface an activity can implement to provide an ImageLoader to its children fragments.
